turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want a Caffe Latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you want to pick up or deliver?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will go and pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, which is the closest Starbucks to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 7680 N Blackstone Ave, Fresno, CA 93720

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, great! Do you want any toppings or extras?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a little bit of cream and sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A small shot of espresso please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. It should be ready in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, I will go pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Let me know if you need anything more.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have my credit card information?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I have it on file.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great so I am all set.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much! Bye now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye!
